scripts.build: emcc ./src/cpp/deform.cpp ./src/cpp/utils/getGlobalStiffnessMatrix.cpp ./src/cpp/utils/getLocalStiffnessMatrix.cpp -o ./src/cpp/dist/deform.js -O3 -s MODULARIZE -s EXPORT_ES6 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_malloc,_free,_deform -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=HEAPF64,HEAPU32,HEAPU8 -I /Users/mohamed/Applications/eigen/ && tsc ./src/deformCpp.ts --module es6 --target es2015 --moduleResolution node && node ./src/deformCpp.js && rm ./src/deformCpp.js ./src/data-model.js
